revised_title: Election of Fellows at the Annual Meeting
tldr: The Annual Meeting for the Election of Fellows took place on June 9, 1887. The following candidates were declared duly elected into the Royal Society: Buchanan, Cash, Douglass, Ewing, Forbes, Gowers, Kennedy, Kirk, Snelus, and Walsingham. The Society expressed gratitude to the scrutators and welcomed the newly elected members.
